About Me

BIO

I've always had a love for programming since I was a kid. I use to write programs and scripts to augment my online gaming. In college, I shelved programming to pursue a career in Forensic Science. Even then, I found myself coming back to programming when I underwent training in R for data analysis. I decided to switch to programming professionally.

I spent a half a year of independent study to reacquaint myself with the major programming languages. Afterwards, I was accepted into Fullstack Academy of Code, wherein I trained to create web applications using Node.js, Postgres, React, and much more. Now that I've graduated from Fullstack Academy, I;m looking for the opportunity too join a team as a developer and utilize my passion and my skills to continue innovating.
